0: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte’s outburst led U.S. President Barack Obama to cancel what would have been their first meeting, a rocky start for the recently-elected Asian leader's administration in dealing with a longstanding ally. Photo: Reuters NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR VIENTIANE, Laos—U.S. President Barack Obama said he shook hands with Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte during a dinner at a summit of Southeast Asian leaders and told him their two governments should work together to make progress on relations.
